answers.answer: I took it at 6w5d, they just want to make sure that you don't need specific dietary restrictions and that you're keeping you and baby healthy. And the drink is not that bad, a little sweet, but overall it is not terrible.
I took it at 25 weeks. The drink I had to drink wasn't yucky at all. It tasted like those drinks we all got at as a kid that came in those barral looking containers? It was just super duper cold!
The drink was delicious haha. But I did mine at 17 w

I think they also did mine so early because of family history. If your family has a history of diabetes they'll do it early. Or it you're overweight by a long shot. So, since I am, they wanted to do it mega early. Not saying anything about.your situation, just giving an example of why they may test that early.
ohh okay yea thank u all. Yea proably I will taste it delicious since I like every drinks that are cold lol.

question: They told me that in my next visit their doing the glucose test the one u drink the nasty thing yall talk about lol. I asked my doc don't I have to take when im farther along she said no that now they do it early! . Has any one done it this early?
title: im 7 weeks and they want to do the glucose test
